messages.title: CAMPAIGNING TO REOPEN GROVE STATION
messages.content: Ed Vaizey's campaign to reopen Grove Station.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ed Vaizey is campaigning for the reopening of Grove Station to improve local transport links.
Ed Vaizey opposes plans by the Liberal Democrats to create a waste dump, pledging support for recycling and local concerns.
Ed Vaizey criticizes the cuts in local services under the Liberal Democrats and promises to deliver better local services.

issues.environment: Pledging support for recycling and opposing plans for a waste dump.
issues.governance: Criticizes Liberal Democrats for increasing council tax by 3.9% while cutting services.

housing.content: Opposes the Liberal Democrats' plan for a waste dump, implying a focus on preserving the local environment and community over building.

images.caption: Ed Vaizey with campaigning team and supporters.
